name: In the Interest of B.C. Appeal of B.C.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John W. Packel, Paul M. George, Ellen T. Greenlee, Philadelphia, for B.C.
casebody.head_matter:
754 A.2d 665
In the Interest of B.C. Appeal of B.C.

Argued Oct. 18, 1999.
Decided June 26, 2000.

Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
